post.body: plain old wordpress self-hosting. nothing fancy. lemme know if u see something funky ;) meanwhile, i'll figure out how thisworks
the popcorn didn't cost me $800 but the crown I had to get after I broke my tooth on that handful of popcorn I ate at your crib did
thanks Kev, i'm trying to find a good widget ;) this stuff is so neat :)
just joined this and trying to figure it out... Trying to step up my technology game in '09 ;)
LOVING your blog ;) I'm definitely a new fan!
that kettle corn is the devil I tell ya. I saw a Garrett popcorn stand in the CHI and I cussed out loud. Cost me almost $800 :(
I'm picking out my outfit for the Eagles/Skins game on Sunday and praying it doesn't rain
